data.message:
While vouchers sound great, and I'll have another try, 
My love for the original will surely never die,
You must understand why I'm in such a bother. 
It's like mum with two boys saying "be more like your brother"!
But the two boys are different, though loved just the same, 
There isn't a need to change one of their names!
While Coke Zero was designed to be just like the first,
It had it's own way of quenching our thirst,
It's own unique taste (we found Coca-Cola just too sweet)
Its sexy black can, a delicious sugar free treat.
Others may wonder if you'll change Diet Coke too..
Could you not just have made a new coke...maybe a label that was Blue???
